file.content:
info: title: BrAPI version: '' openapi: 3.0.0 paths: /search/lists: post: summary: Submit a search request for Lists description: |- Submit a search request for Lists
Search requests allow a client to send a complex query for data. However, the server may not respond with the search results immediately. If a server needs more time to process the request, it might respond with a `searchResultsDbId`. Use the corresponding `GET /search/lists/{searchResultsDbId}` to retrieve the results of the search.
Review the Search Services documentation for additional implementation details. parameters: - $ref: '#/components/parameters/authorizationHeader' requestBody: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ListSearchRequest' responses: '200': $ref: '#/components/responses/ListsListResponse' '202': $ref: '#/components/responses/202AcceptedSearchResponse' '400': $ref: '#/components/responses/400BadRequest' '401': $ref: '#/components/responses/401Unauthorized' '403': $ref: '#/components/responses/403Forbidden' tags: - Lists
